text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum and should only be used to report confirmed bugs.

Please re-direct your query to the users@tomcat.apache.org list.

I would strongly suggest reading http://tomcat.apache.org/findhelp.html followed
by http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html before you post otherwise you are very
unlikely to receive a useful response.
